original: intros n. unfold isPR. unfold charFunction. intros p q. destruct (Nat.eqb (snd (fst p)) 0) eqn:E. - destruct (Nat.eqb n (fst (fst p))) eqn:E'. + rewrite (Bool.eqb_eq _ _ (Nat.eqb_spec _ _) E'). reflexivity. + apply Eq_red. intros contra. inversion contra. - apply Eq_red. intros contra. inversion contra.
